product_name: The North Face Oso Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Oso fleece jacket for women wraps you in plush comfort and warmth, thanks to its soft, silky fleece fabric, and lightweight yet warm hood. High-loft, silky feeling fleece is soft and thermally efficient; taffeta shoulder panels add durability. The North Face Oso fleece jacket features a loose-fitting hood to throw over your head when it gets chilly. Stretch binding finishes hood, cuffs and zippered hand pockets. Draft flap behind front zipper and drawcord hem keep breezes from chilling you out. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Oso fleece jacket for women wraps you in plush comfort and warmth, thanks to its soft, silky fleece fabric, and lightweight yet warm hood.
